text: Meghan Markle and Prince Harry are jetting off on a Royal Tour after getting married last month. Kensington Palace revealed the trip will take place in the Autumn. The palace ’ s official Twitter account wrote : “ The Duke and Duchess of Sussex will undertake an official visit to Australia, Fiji, the Kingdom of Tonga, and New Zealand in the Autumn. “ The tour will fall on the occasion of @ InvictusSydney 2018. ” However, some are concerned about instances of the Zika virus in counties they are planning to visit. Meghan Markle and Prince Harry baby plans may be on hold after royal tour plans revealed The International Association for Medical Assistance for Travellers has said there is currently “ evidence of ongoing Zika virus transmission ” in Fiji and insists “ anti - mosquito bite measures ” should be taken.
